wikipedia_page.main: Andrea Jones (born 1960) is a garden photographer and photographs around the world for magazines, newspapers and books.  She is based in Scotland.

response: In collaboration with Tim Richardson Kingsbury has edited Vista, the Culture and Politics of Gardens and co-chairs events at the Garden Museum in London under the title 'Vista'. He has worked with several notable garden photographers, such as Marianne Majerus and Andrea Jones.
